languages.text: "Что ж, элантах. Раз воля твоя превыше человеческих законов о ксеносах, и рядом с тобой мне не грозит расправа — я принимаю твое предложение".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж. Раз воля твоя превыше человеческих законов о ксеносах, и рядом с тобой мне не грозит расправа — я принимаю твое предложение". {n}Ирлиэт прикусывает губу и ехидно смеется.{/n} "О, не сомневаюсь, Ульран будет просто вне себя..."

languages.text: "Well, elantach. Since your will supersedes human laws on xenos, and I will face no reprisals while I am by your side — I accept your offer."
languages.original_text: "Что ж, элантах. Раз воля твоя превыше человеческих законов о ксеносах, и рядом с тобой мне не грозит расправа — я принимаю твое предложение".

traits.locale_text: "Well, then. Since your will supersedes human laws on Xenos, and I will face no reprisals while I am by your side — I accept your offer." {n}For a split second, Yrliet sheds her serious demeanor and laughs mischievously.{/n} "Oh, Ulrahn will be beside himself..."

"Well, then. Since your will supersedes human laws on Xenos, and I will face no reprisals while I am by your side — I accept your offer." {n}For a split second, Yrliet sheds her serious demeanor and laughs mischievously.{/n} "Oh, Ulrahn will be beside himself..."

"Well, then. Since your will supersedes human laws on Xenos, and I will face no reprisals while I am by your side — I accept your offer." {n}For a split second, Yrliet sheds her serious demeanor and laughs mischievously.{/n} "Oh, Ulrahn will be beside himself..."
"Well, elantach. Since your will supersedes human laws on xenos, and I will face no reprisals while I am by your side — I accept your offer."

languages.text: “好吧，外界人。既然你的意志比人类对待异形的律法更为优先，而且我在你身边时不用担心遭到报复，我愿意接受你的提议。”
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach. Since your will supersedes human laws on xenos, and I will face no reprisals while I am by your side — I accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，外界人。既然你的意志比人类对待异形的律法更为优先，而且我在你身边时不用担心遭到报复，我愿意接受你的提议。”

languages.text: «De acuerdo, elantach. Ya que tu voluntad se antepone a las leyes humanas sobre los xenos y, por tanto, no sufriré represalias mientras esté a tu lado... acepto tu oferta».
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach. Since your will supersedes human laws on xenos, and I will face no reprisals while I am by your side — I accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo, elantach. Ya que tu voluntad se antepone a las leyes humanas sobre los xenos y, por tanto, no sufriré represalias mientras esté a tu lado... acepto tu oferta».

languages.text: 「さて、エランタ。あなたの意思が異種族に対する人間の法に優先するのならば、あなたの傍にいる間は報復行為に遭うこともないわけだ――その提案を受けよう」
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach. Since your will supersedes human laws on xenos, and I will face no reprisals while I am by your side — I accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: 「さて、エランタ。あなたの意思が異種族に対する人間の法に優先するのならば、あなたの傍にいる間は報復行為に遭うこともないわけだ――その提案を受けよう」

languages.text: "Nun, Elantach ... da Euer Wille mehr wiegt als die Menschengesetze für Xenos und ich an Eurer Seite keine Repressalien zu fürchten habe ... nehme ich Euer Angebot an."
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach. Since your will supersedes human laws on xenos, and I will face no reprisals while I am by your side — I accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, Elantach ... da Euer Wille mehr wiegt als die Menschengesetze für Xenos und ich an Eurer Seite keine Repressalien zu fürchten habe ... nehme ich Euer Angebot an."

languages.text: « Bien, elantach. Puisque votre volonté prime les lois humaines concernant les xénos et que je n'aurai pas à craindre de représailles à vos côtés, j'accepte votre offre. »
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach. Since your will supersedes human laws on xenos, and I will face no reprisals while I am by your side — I accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: « Bien, elantach. Puisque votre volonté prime les lois humaines concernant les xénos et que je n'aurai pas à craindre de représailles à vos côtés, j'accepte votre offre. »

languages.text: "Pekâlâ elantach. Madem zenolara yönelik kanunlarımızı geçersiz kılacak bir iradeye sahipsin ve yanındayken misillemeden korkmam gerekmeyecek, o hâlde teklifini kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach. Since your will supersedes human laws on xenos, and I will face no reprisals while I am by your side — I accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ elantach. Madem zenolara yönelik kanunlarımızı geçersiz kılacak bir iradeye sahipsin ve yanındayken misillemeden korkmam gerekmeyecek, o hâlde teklifini kabul ediyorum."
